course.title: Creative Painting - Telling Your Inner World with Images and Words - Course Outline

learningPhilosophy.title: Learning Philosophy
points: From simple to complex to simple: Learn how to create complexity, see details, then learn to simplify
Text and picture book creation will proceed simultaneously
How to make text simple and clear, how to combine text with images
Who are you writing for? Is it simple and clear enough?
Layout methods for text and images

lessons.title: How to express objects?
content: Lines, surfaces, thickness, shadows
Draw the large structure first, then the details
Change observation angles: Draw different sides of an object, flip the canvas to overcome human eye errors
Improve pen control accuracy
Assignment: Observe various materials around you

lessons.title: From inspiration to thumbnail, storyboard creation, texture design
content: Composition, angles
Create interest: Size contrast of characters, scenes, and objects
Texture design, how to combine texture with shadows, how to combine color blocks with lines. For example, what's the difference between a sweater and skin in dark and light areas

lessons.title: How to draw people:
content: Human body: Proportion, coordination, simplification
Face: Front face, side face, eyes, etc. How to make it look like a person
Try drawing from different angles
Facial emotion expression

lessons.title: How to draw human hands and feet:
content: What do nails actually look like?
How to use blocks to summarize 3D hand shapes
What color is skin actually?

lessons.title: How to draw small animals:
content: Observe the physical characteristics of small animals
Try using different materials: pencil, watercolor, colored pencil, crayon, etc.

lessons.title: How to draw nature in the simplest way?
content: For example, mountains, snow, trees, buildings, lakes, reflections
What materials are suitable for expressing nature?

lessons.title: Color: Understand all colors and their specific usage scenarios
content: Basic color knowledge, such as complementary colors, how to mix black, warm and cool colors, etc.
Uses of high saturation and low saturation colors
Design your favorite color combinations and color schemes

lessons.title: Perspective and picture layers:
content: 1, 2, 3 point perspective
Specific applications of perspective, such as how to draw curved roads, human bodies in perspective images
Other options without learning perspective: How to create a sense of layers? Many illustrators don't draw perspective. Just draw near large and far small

lessons.title: How to express picture interest and storytelling
content: Combine unrelated objects to add interest to images
Deform human bodies or objects to express storytelling
